content: DCH 300-X Electric cutter Wet and dry electric hand-held diamond cutter – cutting depth up to 120 mm with 305 mm blades ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Concrete saws- - - ### FEATURES:Features Water kit allows wet cutting, which is 30% faster than dry cutting and virtually dust-free Depth gauge – allows full control of the cutting depth in 10 mm steps from 40-120 mm Ensures a virtually dust-free job site when used with a compatible vacuum cleaner Protection against overheating, overloading and water – prolongs the tools lifetime and increases the operators safety when wet cutting Applications Cutting reinforced concrete, granite curbstones, slabs, brick and masonry blocks Cutting and extending openings for windows, doors and shafts Making preliminary cuts for controlled demolition ### TECHNICAL DATA: Disc diameter: 12 in Cutting depth: 5 in No load RPM: gear 1: 4900 rpm Technical Data | Disc diameter | 12 in | Cutting depth | 5 in | No load RPM | gear 1: 4900 rpm | Triaxial vibration value for cutting concrete slab (ah) | 5.1 m/s² | 1 | Arbor size | 22.2 mm | A-weighted emission sound pressure level | 106 dB (A) | 2 | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 27.8 x 9.4 x 9.3 in | Wet or dry operation | Wet and Dry | According to the applicable product standard (see Operating Instruction for more details) | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) ### ITEMS- 3625345 - DCH 300-X + VC 300-17 X + SPX DCH Universal - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DCH 300-X 120V Diamond cutter - 1x SW 6 Screw driver - 1x SW 24/10 Installation wrench - 1x 300 DLX Depth gauge - 1x VC 300-17 X 120V woS Univ. vacuum cleaner - 1x Dia Blade DCH 12x1 SPX Univ - 1x Gardena water connector (female) - 2x Adapter NEMA 5-20P / 5-15P - 3625042 - DCH 300-X + SPX Universal Blade - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DCH 300-X 120V Diamond cutter - 1x SW 6 Screw driver - 1x SW 24/10 Installation wrench - 1x 300 DLX Depth gauge - 1x Dia Blade DCH 12x1 SPX Univ - 1x Gardena water connector (female) - 1x Adapter NEMA 5-20P / 5-15P - 3625344 - DCH 300-X + 2 SP Universal Blades - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DCH 300-X 120V Diamond cutter - 1x SW 6 Screw driver - 1x SW 24/10 Installation wrench - 1x 300 DLX Depth gauge - 2x Cutting disc SP-S 12x1 DCH univ - 1x Gardena water connector (female) - 1x Adapter NEMA 5-20P / 5-15P - 3625041 - DCH 300-X - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DCH 300-X 120V Diamond cutter - 1x SW 6 Screw driver - 1x SW 24/10 Installation wrench - 1x 300 DLX Depth gauge - 1x Gardena water connector (female) - 1x Adapter NEMA 5-20P / 5-15P
